name: For the Love of Slime
description:
Here is my submission to the Weekly Game Jam 149! It was a bit rushed in the end because I had one less day because of reasons. Hope you enjoy it nonetheless! The music is also downloadable. Common sense takes place, don't say it's your music, credit me, blah blah blah. Hope you enjoy!

How does this relate to the theme? You are the last good slime left and you have to turn the enemies good.
